In a quiet garden, a curious bunny named Thistle discovered an ancient pocket watch buried beneath a bed of daisies. One day, while fiddling with the watch, Thistle was whisked away through time to a vibrant meadow filled with talking flowers and playful butterflies. Each time Thistle pressed the watch, he hopped into a new eraâ€”one moment he was in the prehistoric age, dodging dinosaurs, and the next, he was in a futuristic city, where bunnies flew in hovercrafts. With each adventure, Thistle learned the importance of nature, friendship, and the delicate balance of time, ultimately returning home with newfound wisdom.
